Mod.name: Binding of Noita
Mod.description:
A mod that aims to add as many items from Binding of Isaac as possible to Noita. This mod is a work in progress where I will gradually add items.
Spells in this mod will appear randomly throughout the world like any other spell, if you want to spawn these spells I recommend using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1984977713] CheatGUI [/url].
Spells marked with a '*' indicate that they do not multicast, instead they 'clone' a projectile.
